    A callback for getting data from the database

    DataModel.SetCallback
    A callback for sending data from the database
    Entrant
    This class represents the user(entrants) that participate in the events.
    Entrant.Profile
    Represents the entrant's profile containing name, email and phone number
    EntrantDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Entrant
    Event
    This class contains all of the information and functionality of an Event
    EventAdapter
     
    EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
    listens for event to be clicked on
    EventDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Event

    ImageDataHolder
    Images of posters for Events
    ImageListAdapter
     
    ImageListAdapter.OnImageClickListener
    listens for image being clicked on
    Invitation
    This class is a notification that the Entrant has been accepted into the Event
    InvitationDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Invitation
    MainActivity
     
    Messaging
    This class represents messaging between Organizers and Entrants
    MessagingDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Messaging
    Notification
    An abstract base class representing a notification related to an event.
    NotificationAdapter
    Adapter for displaying a list of Notification objects.
    NotificationAdapter.OnNotificationClickListener
    Interface for handling clicks on a notification item.
    NotificationDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Notification
    NotificationDataHolder.NotificationType
     
    Organizer
    This class contains a collection of events created by an organizer
    OrganizerDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Organizer
    OrganizerListAdapter

    ProfileListAdapter
    Adapter to display a list of Entrant profiles for the admin.
    ProfileListAdapter.OnProfileClickListener
     
    Rejection
    This class is a Notification that the Entrant was rejected from the Event
    RejectionDataHolder
    intermediary between database and Rejection
